Reviews.Title: Good basic laptop
Reviews.Author: Na'alie Humphrey "Bubba"
Reviews.Content: This is a good laptop for watching a DVD, burning CDs. It has the newest version of I-Tunes and I like to use Safari for web browsing. This would work well for a student also.

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Can not do anything but search web sites and e mail you cannot add a printer or any other programs do not waste your money on it because it is useless as a computer
